channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA GPU Display Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA GPU Display Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-6259|2024-08-05T15:25:48.498Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where an incorrect detection and recovery from an invalid state produced by specific user actions may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-6257|2024-08-05T15:25:48.623Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where a NULL pointer dereference may lead to denial of service or potential escalation of privileges
